body:
Comment 1: 
To clarify: M-. and M-* are find-tag and pop-tag-mark. godef-jump can be considered the
equivalent to find-tag, so there's an equivalent for pop-tag-mark missing.

I'll see about implementing it in a straightforward way this weekend. In the meantime
you can use C-x C-x (exchange-point-and-mark) if the jumps are in the same buffer.

#Started
